languages.text: "Я не потерплю подобного на моем корабле. Абеляр, назначь соответствующее наказание нарушительнице. Офицер — у вас есть минута, чтобы изложить ваше дело!"
"I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"
languages.original_text: "Я не потерплю подобного на моем корабле. Абеляр, назначь соответствующее наказание нарушительнице. Офицер — у вас есть минута, чтобы изложить ваше дело!"

traits.locale_text: "I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"
"I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"
"I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"
"I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"

languages.text: “我不允许我的船上发生这种事情。阿贝拉德，给这位中尉合适的惩戒处分。至于你，中尉，你有一分钟的时间说明来意！”
languages.original_text: "I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"

traits.locale_text: “我不允许我的船上发生这种事情。阿贝拉德，给这位中尉合适的惩戒处分。至于你，中尉，你有一分钟的时间说明来意！”

languages.text: «No toleraré esta clase de conducta en mi nave. Abelard, asigne un castigo apropiado a la teniente. Teniente, ¡tiene un minuto para explicarse!».
languages.original_text: "I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"

traits.locale_text: «No toleraré esta clase de conducta en mi nave. Abelard, asigne un castigo apropiado a la teniente. Teniente, ¡tiene un minuto para explicarse!».

languages.text: 「私の船でこのような行為は許されない。アベラルド、少尉に適切な処罰を与えろ。少尉、1分で用件を言え！」
languages.original_text: "I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の船でこのような行為は許されない。アベラルド、少尉に適切な処罰を与えろ。少尉、1分で用件を言え！」

languages.text: "Ich dulde kein solches Verhalten auf meinem Schiff. Abelard, belegt den Lieutenant mit einer angemessenen Disziplinarstrafe. Lieutenant, Ihr habt eine Minute, Euer Anliegen vorzutragen!"
languages.original_text: "I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich dulde kein solches Verhalten auf meinem Schiff. Abelard, belegt den Lieutenant mit einer angemessenen Disziplinarstrafe. Lieutenant, Ihr habt eine Minute, Euer Anliegen vorzutragen!"

languages.text: « Je ne tolérerai pas ce genre de comportement à mon bord. Abélard, je vous laisse décider de la sanction à infliger à la lieutenante. Quant à vous, Vent, vous avez une minute pour vous expliquer et pas une de plus ! »
languages.original_text: "I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne tolérerai pas ce genre de comportement à mon bord. Abélard, je vous laisse décider de la sanction à infliger à la lieutenante. Quant à vous, Vent, vous avez une minute pour vous expliquer et pas une de plus ! »

languages.text: "Gemimde böylesi davranışlara müsamaha göstermem. Abelard, Teğmen'e gerekli cezaların verildiğinden emin ol. Teğmen, vaziyetini izah etmek için bir dakikan var!"
languages.original_text: "I will not tolerate this kind of conduct on my ship. Abelard, assign the lieutenant an appropriate punishment. Lieutenant, you have one minute to state your business!"

traits.locale_text: "Gemimde böylesi davranışlara müsamaha göstermem. Abelard, teğmene gerekli cezaların verildiğinden emin ol. Teğmen, vaziyetini izah etmek için bir dakikan var!"
